name: Miss Misfortune
description:
Aren't you tired of losing all your Goddamn skulls all the time?
Well Miss Misfortune is too! Help her find all her lost skulls and reclaim her price on the throne!

In this puzzle platfortmer you will have to find all the skuls, by solving puzzles, causing misfortune and searching for hidden skulls!

Break mirrors, step on cracks and knock over saltshakers, all this and more in the new Miss Misfortune!

(for players aged 6-99)

Credits to:
Nathan Dhaene : Art
Lucy Lesire : Coding
Karolien Aerts : Cat noises (Muis)
Yasna Charlier : Emotional support
